questions.question_text:
An organization is researching Microsoft 365 licensing.
The organization must buy licenses that include Microsoft Intune.
You need to determine which licenses meet the requirements.
Which three licenses can you choose? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
Intune is included in the following licenses:

 Microsoft 365 E5
 Microsoft 365 E3
 Enterprise Mobility + Security E5
 Enterprise Mobility + Security E3
 Microsoft 365 Business Premium
 Microsoft 365 F1
 Microsoft 365 F3
 Microsoft 365 Government G5
 Microsoft 365 Government G3
 Intune for Education

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/intune/fundamentals/licenses

Selected Answer: ADE
Microsoft Intune Plan 1
A cloud-based unified endpoint management solution that is included in the following licenses:

Microsoft 365 E5
Microsoft 365 E3
Enterprise Mobility + Security E5
Enterprise Mobility + Security E3
Microsoft 365 Business Premium
Microsoft 365 F1
Microsoft 365 F3
Microsoft 365 Government G5
Microsoft 365 Government G3
Microsoft Intune for Education
For intune you need Premium or higher, therefore, ADE

questions.question_text:
A company is developing their Windows as a service (WaaS) strategy.
The company needs to preview features from Microsoft in the development cycle as soon as possible.
You need to select the correct solution.
Which solution should you use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
What is flighting?
Flighting is the process of running Windows Insider Preview Builds on your device. When you run these early versions of Windows and give us feedback, you can help us shape the future of Windows. Once you've registered for the program, you can run Insider Preview builds on as many devices as you want, each in the channel of your choice.

comments.content: Computer has no internet connection, so using Intune won't be possible.

questions.answer_description:
Long-Term Servicing Channel (LTSC)
With the Long-Term Servicing Channel, a new major version of Windows Server is released every 2-3 years. Users are entitled to 5 years of mainstream support and 5 years of extended support. This channel provides systems with a long servicing option and functional stability, and can be installed with Server Core or
Server with Desktop Experience installation options. Deployments of the LTSC of Windows Server are not affected by Semi-Annual Channel releases. The Long-
Term Servicing Channel will continue to receive security and non-security updates, but it will not receive the new features and functionality.
Reference:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/servicing-channels-comparison
questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
A company uses Microsoft 365. The company has an application that runs on a device that does not have internet access.
The device can only be updated manually every two years.
You need to determine how you should update the device.
Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Answers are correct : NO, YES, YES :
In the direct-bill model, partners purchase Microsoft products and subscriptions directly from Microsoft and sell them directly to their customers through their in-house sales staff.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/partner-center/csp-overview

comments.content: yes, it threw me off as well and realized it was referring to customers
I was wrong, the answer is correct, the question is referring to customers and not partners

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
Instructions: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

DRAG DROP -
You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Which release types are used for each deployment scenario?
Match each deployment scenario to its appropriate release type. To answer, drag the appropriate deployment scenarios to the correct release types. Each deployment scenario may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Wide spread G.A
Widespread deployment is an example of a “General availability” release type in Microsoft. General availability means that a product or service is officially released to the general public for widespread use.

Limited deployment for a short duration is an example of a “Public preview” release type in Microsoft. Public previews are typically early releases of a product or service that are made available to a broader audience for testing and feedback before the full general availability release

Limited deployment to a small number of organizations for a short duration is an example of a “Private” release type in Microsoft. In a private release, the product or service is made available to a select group of organizations or individuals for testing and evaluation before being made more widely available.
